text:
Georgia reopens convention center as hospital, marks nearly 4,500 new cases of coronavirus — its highest single-day increase.

— Infections nearly 10%
— Total cases 110,000+ 
— Deaths nearly 3,000

Trump ally Gov. Kemp reopened restaurants, bars in June.
